name: Gift Switch
description:
Have you ever played that game which had circles and player and has to pass a certain colour BORINGG!!!?

But that's what I have made basically this was made for a game jam known as Gift Jam so I have made this game to some specific person. SO yeah and yes please don't check my source code as Game Jam source code is not beautiful to look umm and yes there are a lot of scripts which have no use but still is there but see its Their okayyy.
